properties.areaDesc: Red Lodge Foothills, including the locations of Red Lodge
properties.description:
* WHAT...Occasional southwest wind gusts of 50 to 65 mph expected

* WHERE...Red Lodge foothills.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning.

* IMPACTS...The strong winds may blow down trees and power lines. Sudden strong wind gusts will make travel difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts are expected in higher foothill locations, but could also impact areas near Red Lodge.

properties.areaDesc: Red Lodge Foothills;Beartooth Foothills;Including the locations of Roberts, Fishtail, Red Lodge, McLeod, Nye and Roscoe
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph creating significant blowing and drifting snow.

* WHERE...Beartooth Foothills and Red Lodge Foothills.

* WHEN...From 3 PM Tuesday afternoon to 5 AM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Roads will become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening and morning commutes. The cold and wet conditions will be dangerous for young livestock.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall is expected Tuesday night.

title: Current watches, warnings, and advisories for Montana
